burlap.behavior.valuefunction

Class QFunction.QFunctionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.valuefunction.QFunction.QFunctionHelper
  • Enclosing interface:
    QFunction

    public static class QFunction.QFunctionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of helper static methods that may be commonly used by code that uses a QFunction instance. In particular, methods for computing the value function of a state, given the Q-values (the max Q-value or policy weighted value).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QFunctionHelper()

    • Constructor Detail

      • QFunctionHelper

        public QFunctionHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getOptimalValue

        public static double getOptimalValue(QFunction qSource,
                                     State s)
        Returns the optimal state value function for a state given a QFunction. The optimal value is the max Q-value. If no actions are permissible in the input state, then zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        qSource - the QFunction capable of producing Q-values.
        s - the query State for which the value should be returned.
        Returns:
        the max Q-value for all possible Q-values in the state.

      • getOptimalValue

        public static double getOptimalValue(QFunction qSource,
                                     State s,
                                     TerminalFunction tf)
        Returns the optimal state value for a state given a QFunction. The optimal value is the max Q-value. If no actions are permissible in the input state or the input state is a terminal state, then zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        qSource - the QFunction capable of producing Q-values.
        s - the query State for which the value should be returned.
        tf - a terminal function.
        Returns:
        the max Q-value for all possible Q-values in the state or zero if there are not permissible actions or if the state is a terminal state.

      • getPolicyValue

        public static double getPolicyValue(QFunction qSource,
                                    State s,
                                    Policy p)
        Returns the state value under a given policy for a state and QFunction. The value is the expected Q-value under the input policy action distribution. If no actions are permissible in the input state, then zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        qSource - the QFunction capable of producing Q-values.
        s - the query State for which the value should be returned.
        p - the policy defining the action distribution.
        Returns:
        the expected Q-value under the input policy action distribution

      • getPolicyValue

        public static double getPolicyValue(QFunction qSource,
                                    State s,
                                    Policy p,
                                    TerminalFunction tf)
        Returns the state value under a given policy for a state and QFunction. The value is the expected Q-value under the input policy action distribution. If no actions are permissible in the input state, then zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        qSource - the QFunction capable of producing Q-values.
        s - the query State for which the value should be returned.
        p - the policy defining the action distribution.
        tf - a terminal function.
        Returns:
        the expected Q-value under the input policy action distribution or zero if there are not permissible actions or if the state is a terminal state.
